about_the_game:
this game is about a hero who save the world at the end of world.
a man who called mao want to upon ship safely at end of world.
accidentally,he save the world.
In this game,you will find many old funny story about Chinese internet.
you also can pk will monsters and answer the questions to get the key item.
at the end,you will find a final boss which you must kill him then you can win the game.

This game made by rpg maker series.And you can gain the item and equipment in this game.
You also can release skill to self or animy.

In this game,you must get two half ticket, in order to call the end of world's ship，to escape the death.

you can let brother chun,brother zeng,sister furong and sister feng to joined your team.

they will be the partners and battle to animys with you.

Gameplay

up arrow as up,down arrow as down,left arrow as left,right arrow as right,enter as enter,esc as esc.
game is a round rpg game.after you leave the city or enter the maze，you can fight with your anemy.
detailed_description:
this game is about a hero who save the world at the end of world.
a man who called mao want to upon ship safely at end of world.
accidentally,he save the world.
In this game,you will find many old funny story about Chinese internet.
you also can pk will monsters and answer the questions to get the key item.
at the end,you will find a final boss which you must kill him then you can win the game.

This game made by rpg maker series.And you can gain the item and equipment in this game.
You also can release skill to self or animy.

In this game,you must get two half ticket, in order to call the end of world's ship，to escape the death.

you can let brother chun,brother zeng,sister furong and sister feng to joined your team.

they will be the partners and battle to animys with you.

Gameplay

up arrow as up,down arrow as down,left arrow as left,right arrow as right,enter as enter,esc as esc.
game is a round rpg game.after you leave the city or enter the maze，you can fight with your anemy.
name: 二逼青年的救赎

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: xp,win7,win10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
